frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-refresh-wifi-connections
frozen.shortDescription: This extension adds a refresh button to the Wi-Fi connection selection dialog to manually request for a network scan.
frozen.longDescription:
This extension adds a refresh button to the Wi-Fi connection selection dialog to manually request for a network scan.

NOTE: In GNOME Shell 3.32 and above, the available network list is automatically updated every 15 seconds, so most people probably don't need this extension anymore.
